BreadcrumbDescription: We've managed to defeat Elias and learn more about Lilith's plan for Sanctuary. Now we must return to Kehjistan and find a way to stop her.
Callback43Header: Meet with Horadrim in Parched Wanderer Inn in Tarsarak
Name: Evil Stirs in Kehjistan
Phase44Description: Our goal lies in Kehjistan. I should meet with Donan, Lorath and Neyrelle in the town of Tarsarak so we can discuss our next steps.
Phase44OutsideSubzoneHeader: Meet with Horadrim in Parched Wanderer Inn in Tarsarak
Phase9Description: It appears that Knights Penitent are on the move in Kehjistan. I'm not sure if it's a good sign or not. I should speak with the Horadrim to discuss our next steps.
